On #AntiSlaveryDay2019 we redouble our efforts to end #humantrafficking. @OSCEPA has been on the forefront, pushing key initiatives and adopting my 20 resolutions similar to the 5 US laws I've authored, offering real strategies to combat this nefarious trait.

BREAKING: the #HongKongHumanRightsandDemocracyAct has cleared the House of Representatives. Onto our colleagues in the Senate to work expeditiously & pass this important legislation. Click link below to read excerpts of my remarks made during Floor Debate: https://chrissmith.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=406171 …

5 years ago—in 2014—joined by @SpeakerPelosi, 1st introduced the bipartisan #HongKongHumanRightsandDemocracyAct, & I reintroduced it in 2015, 2017 & again this year. The current version, #HR3289—cosponsored by @RepMcGovern—is a blueprint for meaningful action. Pass it today.

Today, with consideration of the #HongKongHumanRightsandDemocracyAct, urging the Chinese President and the Hong Kong Chief Executive, Carrie Lam, to faithfully honor the government’s promises embedded in Basic Law and the Sino-British Declaration.

On a daily basis, we are reminded of the desire of the brave people of #HongKong to be free, and how the totalitarian regime of Xi Jinping is working to dismantle the rights & liberties of the people of #HongKong. Let’s pass the #HongKongHumanRightsandDemocracyAct.
